verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, When <S%H3588><s%> ye be come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of your habitations, <S%H4186><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> unto you,

And will make <S%H6213><s%> an offering by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in performing <S%H6381><s%> a vow, <S%H5088><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in a freewill offering, <S%H5071><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in your solemn feasts, <S%H4150><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the herd, <S%H1241><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the flock: <S%H6629><s%>

Then shall he that offereth <S%H7126><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H7126><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of a tenth deal <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> shalt thou prepare <S%H6213><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> lamb. <S%H3532><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> for a ram, <S%H352><s%> thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the third <S%H7992><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And when <S%H3588><s%> thou preparest <S%H6213><s%> a bullock <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in performing <S%H6381><s%> a vow, <S%H5088><s%> or <S%H176><s%> peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Then shall he bring <S%H7126><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> a bullock <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with half <S%H2677><s%> a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> a hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> for an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3602><s%> shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> bullock, <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> or <S%H176><s%> for a lamb, <S%H7716><s%> <S%H3532><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a kid. <S%H5795><s%>
According to the number <S%H4557><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye shall prepare, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3602><s%> shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> to every one <S%H259><s%> according to their number. <S%H4557><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> that are born of the country <S%H249><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> these things <S%H428><s%> after this manner, <S%H3602><s%> in offering <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojourn <S%H1481><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you, or <S%H176><s%> whosoever <S%H834><s%> be among <S%H8432><s%> you in your generations, <S%H1755><s%> and will offer <S%H6213><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as <S%H834><s%> ye do, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he shall do. <S%H6213><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> shall be both for you of the congregation, <S%H6951><s%> and also for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> with you, an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations: <S%H1755><s%> as ye are, so shall the stranger <S%H1616><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
One <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> manner <S%H4941><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> for you, and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, When ye come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H589><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> you,

Then it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that, when ye eat <S%H398><s%> of the bread <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3899><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> ye shall offer up <S%H7311><s%> a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Ye shall offer up <S%H7311><s%> a cake <S%H2471><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of your dough <S%H6182><s%> for a heave offering: <S%H8641><s%> as ye do the heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the threshingfloor, <S%H1637><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall ye heave <S%H7311><s%> it.
Of the first <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7225><s%> of your dough <S%H6182><s%> ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> in your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> ye have erred, <S%H7686><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> observed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%>

Even <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H413><s%> you by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, and henceforward <S%H1973><s%> among your generations; <S%H1755><s%>

Then it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> aught be committed <S%H6213><s%> by ignorance <S%H7684><s%> without the knowledge <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5869><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> with his meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and his drink offering, <S%H5262><s%> according to the manner, <S%H4941><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> them; for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is ignorance: <S%H7684><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> their offering, <S%H7133><s%> a sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and their sin offering <S%H2403><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> their ignorance: <S%H7684><s%>

And it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them; seeing <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> were in ignorance. <S%H7684><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> any <S%H259><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> through ignorance, <S%H7684><s%> then he shall bring <S%H7126><s%> a she goat <S%H5795><s%> of the first <S%H1323><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> that sinneth ignorantly, <S%H7683><s%> when he sinneth <S%H2398><s%> by ignorance <S%H7684><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him; and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> him.

Ye shall have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> for him that sinneth <S%H6213><s%> through ignorance, <S%H7684><s%> both for him that is born <S%H249><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

But the soul <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> aught presumptuously, <S%H3027><s%> <S%H7311><s%> whether he be born in the land, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H249><s%> or a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> reproacheth <S%H1442><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he hath despised <S%H959><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and hath broken <S%H6565><s%> his commandment, <S%H4687><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall utterly be cut off; <S%H3772><s%> <S%H3772><s%> his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall be upon him.

And while the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> they found <S%H4672><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> that gathered <S%H7197><s%> sticks <S%H6086><s%> upon the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And they that found <S%H4672><s%> him gathering <S%H7197><s%> sticks <S%H6086><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> him unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
And they put <S%H5117><s%> him in ward, <S%H4929><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it was not <S%H3808><s%> declared <S%H6567><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> should be done <S%H6213><s%> to him.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> The man <S%H376><s%> shall be surely put to death: <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> him without <S%H413><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and stoned <S%H7275><s%> him with stones, <S%H68><s%> and he died; <S%H4191><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and bid <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> them that they make <S%H6213><s%> them fringes <S%H6734><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the borders <S%H3671><s%> of their garments <S%H899><s%> throughout their generations, <S%H1755><s%> and that they put <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the fringe <S%H6734><s%> of the borders <S%H3671><s%> a ribbon <S%H6616><s%> of blue: <S%H8504><s%>

And it shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto you for a fringe, <S%H6734><s%> that ye may look upon <S%H7200><s%> it, and remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them; and that ye seek <S%H8446><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> after <S%H310><s%> your own heart <S%H3824><s%> and your own eyes, <S%H5869><s%> after <S%H310><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> use to go a whoring: <S%H2181><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> ye may remember, <S%H2142><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and be <S%H1961><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> unto your God. <S%H430><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
